description:
Airy sun-filled studio in high end building off Bedford L! Highly desirable location: near McCarren Park/Farmer's mkt, Smorgasburg, Wythe Hotel, McCarren Park Pool, Brooklyn Bowl, Brooklyn Brewery, and Output. Two blocks from the East River and a short walk to fabulous Greenpoint! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
Look forward to making your stay as comfortable and welcoming as possible!

Chef's kitchen (atypical for NY studio), washer/dryer, 2 closets, 24 hour concierge, fitness studio, amazing roof deck with Manhattan and water views. Building is immaculately clean and offers free coffee/tea in the lobby, outdoor lounge and fresh herb garden!
name: Sun-filled doorman bldg studio on Bedford L!!
review: Lauren's apartment is beautiful! Very sunny, clean and quiet. It's right in the heart of the action in Brooklyn - great location. Lauren was very communicative, friendly and super helpful - really fast response time. Absolutely loved our stay here. Would book again for sure.
